thread.section_title: OLDIES.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OLDIES.com | oldies.com | 3 of 409
thread.title: Dr. Whovian

author: Dr. Whovian
title: Dr. Whovian
text:
I found a lot of great DVDs that I was looking for, but OLDIES' pricing, in many ways, is not competitive with Amazon (with whom I do the majority of my online shopping).
I compared many DVD prices between OLDIES and Amazon and 8 times out of 10, Amazon had comparable or lower prices. For example, the DVD "Doctor Who: Brain of Morbius" is $16.67 on OLDIES but $12.96 on Amazon. Another Doctor Who DVD "Key to Time" is $79.64 on OLDIES but $58.99 on Amazon.
OLDIES does have some slightly better prices but only on a select number of products I was looking for. You also need to spend $50 for free shipping on OLDIES, which may not be cost effective if you have to spend more on fewer items.
I would shop on OLDIES more but if the prices don't budge, I will probably stick with Amazon.
